title: Why is my screen always black on blind pick
body: It shows I logged in first, but my damn screen is black until after everyone calls their lanes. I have no connection issues nor lag nor any problem. This is on Riots end.

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find a record of service issues with our matchmaking servers. Issues in champ select are commonly caused by an *unstable connection* to our servers. Our connection guide will walk you through some steps to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League.

If you continue to experience these issues after you've taken those steps, let me know. ^.^
